version.author: Oded Davidov
version.changelog: Tracks that are hidden in the TCP now hidden by default Added setting to always show hidden tracks Added setting to overwrite without asking Checks for regions that are not mapped in region matrix Checks for regions and markers that are selected but don't exist, or whose ID had changed Documentation updates to reflect changes
